abstract: Apple’s response to the F.C.C. inquiry into the rejection of the Google Voice iPhone app cracked the veneer of the App Store review process.
snippet: Apple’s response to the F.C.C. inquiry into the rejection of the Google Voice iPhone app cracked the veneer of the App Store review process.
lead_paragraph: On Friday, Apple, along with AT&T and Google, filed responses to the Federal Communications Commission‘s inquiry into Apple’s rejection of an iPhone application developed by Google.

headline.main: Apple Lifts the Curtain on App Store Approvals
